heading: Tonight
text: Partly to mostly cloudy, with a chance of snow showers developing south and west of I-89, spreading north and east after midnight. Light accumulations expected, with heavier totals possible in the southwest. Lows in the single digits north, increasing into the teens south. Light wind.

heading: Saturday
text: Cloudy. Chance of light scattered snow showers, diminishing from north to south. Highs from the teens to low 20s north, mid to upper 20s in the south. Light wind.

heading: Saturday Night
text: Mostly clear with periods of clouds developing after midnight. Lows from just below zero into the single digits. Calm wind.
